about_the_game:
CuDo is a 2D arcade game about collecting as many points as you can while dodging enemies coming at you from all sides. There are several powerups to collect to make your life easier (or harder). The more points you get the faster the enemies are coming at you!

Gameplay basics

In the game you play as a little blue square trying to collect as many of the yellow checkpoints as you can.
You have to be careful though as there are red enemies coming from all sides of the screen just waiting to run into you so you better dodge them!
The enemies get faster the higher your score is so while the game starts out fairly easy it will not remain that way!
To help you with your goal there are powerups you can collect that spawn every now and then.

The powerups

There are different types of powerups that the game can spawn and after you collect them will give you an effect that lasts for a couple of seconds, here is a short overview over what they do:
  • Speedboost: This powerup will speed you up to make it easier to dodge enemies and collect checkpoints
  • Enemy slowdown: This powerup slows the enemies down so it's easier to dodge them but reaching the next checkpoint might still remain a challenge
  • Size swap: The normally larger enemies will shrink while the powerups become bigger, making enemies easier to dodge and checkpoints easier to collect
  • Godmode: For a short period of time you will be invincible so you can just pass through enemies but keep in mind that you don't want to be in contact with enemies when the effect wears off!

name: CuDo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Configuration untested due to lack of slow enough hardware
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: CuDo is a 2D arcade game about collecting as many points as you can while dodging enemies coming at you from all sides. There are several powerups to collect to make your life easier (or harder). The more points you get the faster the enemies are coming at you!
